game.description: Alienbusters is a game similar to Battlezone. The player controls a tank whose task is to liberate the Solar System. The player has to find enemy objects and destroy them but enemy tanks try to prevent him from fulfilling the task. The player can shoot them with his cannon but immediately dies if they hit him. To find his targets, the player has to use his compass. Their coordinates are sent to the player during the game.
game.name: Alienbusters
